title: Issue in buffered sockets of type net.Conn
body:
by **daH4K0R**: 
1.Compile both files
2.Run the Broken Buffer Example File. i.e. ./BrokenBufferExample
3.Run NetSend with a argument. i.e. ./NetSend Hi

BrokenBufferExample should print what you entered in Netsend. However it 
does not unless you uncomment line 35. I can see no reason that line 35 
should make it work.

GOOS = linux
GOARCH = i386


Revision
2bl3a45c7c91+ tip

This issue only seems to appear with this specific situation. Other 
buffered sockets work fine.
Attachments: 1. NetSend.go (498 bytes) 1. BrokenBufferExample.go (1148 bytes)
